name: Shikhondo(食魂徒) - Soul Eater
description: Select one of the Grim Reaper or girl. Find escaped yokai from limbo, extricate soul that they absorbed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTS250 DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX650 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
